22.5 Balance of Activity Classes
A good ﬁrst check of the data is to investigate the balance of each activity. We believe that
each of the 30 subjects performed each of the six activities. Conﬁrming this expectation will
both check that the data is indeed balanced, making it easier to model, and conﬁrm that we are
